flawed_nl_solution:
Mary will inflate a total of 10 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<10*30=3000>>3000 balloons
Jess will inflate a total of 7 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<7*30=210>>210 balloons
Christina will inflate a total of 4 balloons/minute x 15 minutes = <<4*15=60>>60 balloons
Combining all balloons, they made 3000 balloons + 210 balloons + 60 balloons = <<3000+210+60=3270>>3270 balloons
#### 3270

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
